topic.title: How to install kxoid P2P message
topic.body: How to do that can you send the pictures and tell me. Please.

1577863956_15Jmu7DkbxqtQ6mFhu6gLT1pbiMM5.body:
> [shiruka](#comment_25_1MHdmQEW2HS6sZNgfi3VmtegHc6fUEyVkW): if you mean peermessage, then go here: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1CeEXxqemr5CcVQAAmrW13QYwZV4kAkQz6/ and then just click install. If there is no install option it's because you probably have it installed.  [...]

If i do in my phone, what should I do?

> [shiruka](#comment_25_1MHdmQEW2HS6sZNgfi3VmtegHc6fUEyVkW): if you mean peermessage, then go here: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1CeEXxqemr5CcVQAAmrW13QYwZV4kAkQz6/ and then just click install. If there is no install option it's because you probably have it installed.  [...]

It still doesn't working, can you send the pictures to me for instructe?

> [filips](#comment_371_1LFu1BTScmY82HHtg3TY2jAuSrCYNsQWEY): What isn't working? Could you please send picture of problem?

Do you have any contact ways and I will sand the problem?
internal error, OSError, dlopen failed library "library 32" not found

> [filips](#comment_372_1LFu1BTScmY82HHtg3TY2jAuSrCYNsQWEY): You can use ZeroMail or create public issue on GitHub repository.

Sorry, my zeromail sometimes has a trouble, maybe for receive only, would you mind in send by protonmail?

> [filips](#comment_373_1LFu1BTScmY82HHtg3TY2jAuSrCYNsQWEY): Oh, you are trying to do this on phone? Then it is a bit harder as ZeroNet for Android currently only supports only version in Python 2.7. [...]

I want to ask the folder is peer Message or peer Db is it the same folder?

> [filips](#comment_374_1LFu1BTScmY82HHtg3TY2jAuSrCYNsQWEY): It is PeerMessage. But you need to create that folder yourself.

OMG, I still can't assces for PeerMessage, there still has a bug, can I send you pictures by protonmail?

> [gitcenter](#comment_1175_1Cy3ntkN2GN9MH6EaW6eHpi4YoRS2nK5Di): I have just fixed a bug in PeerMessage, can you please try reinstalling it?

Sorry, I repeated many times for installation. It still doesn't work.

> [secretcr](#comment_9_15Jmu7DkbxqtQ6mFhu6gLT1pbiMM55oywF): Sorry, I repeated many times for installation. It still doesn't work.

When I do it by phone
Actually I have a screen shots but I forgot how to type that code for upload my screen shots

> [gitcenter](#comment_1177_1Cy3ntkN2GN9MH6EaW6eHpi4YoRS2nK5Di): Hm, looks so. We might want to ping @mkg20001 though. Anyways, I still can't help without screenshots.

Hi please find my profile in zeroMe, I post my screen shots on it
